seoDescription: International Blockchain Olympiad is a multidisciplinary design and building competition. IBCOL 2019 invites students from around the world to solve real-world challenges through decentralised applications.
subhead: Student Relations for the 2019 International Blockchain Olympiad
schoolAmbassadorsDescriptions: School ambassadors represent IBCOL 2019 on their campuses
applyAmbassadorsLabel: Apply to be an IBCOL school ambassador

schoolAmbassadors.title: Budapest University of Technology and Economics (BME)
Donetsk State University of Economics and Trade (DonNUET)
Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (KAIST)
Pohang University of Science and Technology (POSTECH)

schoolAmbassadorProgrammeDescription: Have a passion for technology, innovation, or student competitions? Take part in building the first ever International Blockchain Olympiad! We are looking for school ambassadors to promote IBCOL 2019 in your local campus.
responsibilities: Promote the International Blockchain Olympiad on campus
Take lead and be the point of contact between interested applicants and registered participants
Arrange with student organisations or faculty or department for subsidies
Organise events for preparing students to compete in IBCOL 2019, such as team formation, blockchain training, and general promotion
Act in the best interest of the International Blockchain Olympiad
perks: Gain valuable experience and insights into the enterprise, government, and blockchain worlds
1 free course (DC3) issued by the Hong Kong Blockchain Society (Value: 2000 USD)
School Ambassador Certificate issued by the International Blockchain Olympiad

Entitled to 10% discount on admission to IBCOL 2019 (Value up to 2000 USD - includes full 2-day access to tech expo, fireside chats, keynote luncheons, and networking sessions), for each referred team. For example, 3 referred teams is 30%, 7 referred teams is 70% off, 10 or more is 100% off, i.e. free ticket.
financialAssistanceDescription: Applicants are evaluated on a case-by-case basis, with no bearing on the actual results of the competition. Students may apply for subsidies to reduce the financial burden of participating in IBCOL 2019, such as the entry fee, travel to the main event in Hong Kong, and accommodation assistance while in Hong Kong. Only eligible for registrants before Feb 1.
